answerText: The Road to Mecca[10] The Road to Mecca is a work by this South African playwright who also wrote Master Harold... and the Boys.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | 1 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play takes place in the town of New Bethesda. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which the artist Miss Helen is visited by Elsa Barlow, who tries to prevent her from moving into an old age home.
